      • CritialSectionReadySenderPool

    • Method Detail

      • multicastSend

        public void multicastSend(java.util.List<CriticalSectionService> services)
        creates a threadpool with services.size() threads, to send services.size() messages in a concurrent way. Then stops the threadpool to forbid the send of more messages in current poool. To send messages uses the send(CriticalSectionService) method
        Parameters:
        services - the list of sercvices to notify that this node is ready

      • await

        public void await()
        waits for the response of all messages

      • send

        public void send(CriticalSectionService service)
        send one critical section ready message to broker.
        Parameters:
        service - the service which will be notified that this node is ready
        See Also:
        CriticalSectionService.ready()
